Articles.Content:
After having played for a while, exit out to the game menu, and then quit the game (from the menu)... instead of exiting cleanly, the game crashes...

Can't give any better instructions for reproducing this, but hopefully the logs and crash dump will make sense to you guys.

Version: Latest from Steam (1.3)

Log and crash.dmp: https://1drv.ms/u/s!AmFxMLZJRXxKnckDHh6SlYXAEz4YaQ

Mods (manually added):

  • Mark One Laboratory Extensions (M.O.L.E.) 1.7.2
  • NearFutureSpacecraft 0.7.2
  • StockalikeStationPartsExpansion 0.5.1

Mods (export from CKAN):

  • AllYAll 0.11.0
  • AtmosphereAutopilot v1.5.10
  • AT-Utils v1.4.4
